players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Oh no, Bob is dead! I was so sure he was the detective. Who do we suspect?"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "I'm so shocked by Bob's death! Charlie, you claim Diana is the mafioso after investigating her. That's a bold accusation for day one. Are you sure about your investigation?"
Charlie: "Yes, I am certain. Diana is the mafioso. We must vote for her to win."
You: "Charlie, if Diana is the mafioso, why would you reveal that so quickly? That could be a tactic to get us to vote her out without any further discussion. I'm still unsure who to trust."
Diana: "Alice, Charlie is clearly trying to frame me! If he were really the detective, why would he reveal himself on day one? He's the mafioso trying to eliminate town members quickly."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana

Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.

Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Alice: "I'm so shocked by Bob's death! Charlie, you claim Diana is the mafioso after investigating her. That's a bold accusation for day one. Are you sure about your investigation?"
Charlie: "Yes, I am certain. Diana is the mafioso. We must vote for her to win."
Alice: "Charlie, if Diana is the mafioso, why would you reveal that so quickly? That could be a tactic to get us to vote her out without any further discussion. I'm still unsure who to trust."
You: "Alice, Charlie is clearly trying to frame me! If he were really the detective, why would he reveal himself on day one? He's the mafioso trying to eliminate town members quickly."
